entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NorthwindSetOperationsQuerySqlServerTest.Intersect_nested failed #32940
  • Accidentally using field instead of property for JSON metadata produce hard to understand exception #32939
  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of type ''. The exception 'Unable to resolve service for type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptions`1[Project3.Data.TestContext]' while attempting to activate 'Project3.Data.TestContext'.' was thrown while attempting to create an instance. For the different patterns supported at design time #32936

Closed

  • Identity Annotation is not updated by migration #28377
  • Support cache when creating a sequence #11261
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite issue with multiple Blob colums #32747
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Also catch type initialization errors when attempting to load types that might not exist #32938
  • Stop specifying incorrect column name in snapshot for owned type of generic entity type #32937

Merged

  • Support resetting SQL Server IDENTITY #32931
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.Core issue with multiple Blob colums #32770
    waiting-for-response, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix lock loosing in concurrency detector for multiple contexts on one thread #31891
    needs-design
  • Add fill factor to keys and unique constraints #32900
  • Fix incremental builds #32860
  • Disregard parameter names in `ExpressionEqualityComparer.GetHashCode` #30755
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
  • Proposed fix to #7172 - Consider non-default column collation in table variable #29518
  • Translate x.parse #28337
